member.name: T:AppointmentService.Controllers.AppointmentsController
member.summary: RESTful API controller for managing appointments. This is a minimal implementation with in-memory storage for demonstration purposes.

member.name: M:AppointmentService.Controllers.AppointmentsController.GetAll
member.summary: Get all appointments

member.name: M:AppointmentService.Controllers.AppointmentsController.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get a specific appointment by ID
member.response: If the appointment is not found

member.name: M:AppointmentService.Controllers.AppointmentsController.Create(AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.CreateAppointmentDto)
member.summary: Create a new appointment

member.name: M:AppointmentService.Controllers.AppointmentsController.Update(System.Guid,AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.UpdateAppointmentDto)
member.summary: Update an existing appointment
member.response: If the appointment is not found

member.name: M:AppointmentService.Controllers.AppointmentsController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: Delete an appointment
member.response: If the appointment was successfully deleted
If the appointment is not found

member.name: T:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment
member.summary: Represents a medical appointment in the system. This is a first-class domain entity as per architecture rules.

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.UserId
member.summary: ID of the user (elderly person) who has this appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.DoctorName
member.summary: Name of the doctor for this appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.Location
member.summary: Location where the appointment will take place

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.AppointmentDate
member.summary: Date and time of the appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.Notes
member.summary: Additional notes or instructions for the appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the appointment was created

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.Appointment.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the appointment was last updated

member.name: T:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.AppointmentResponseDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for appointment responses

member.name: M:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.AppointmentResponseDto.FromEntity(AppointmentService.Models.Appointment)
member.summary: Maps an Appointment entity to a response DTO

member.name: T:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.CreateAppointmentDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for creating a new appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.CreateAppointmentDto.UserId
member.summary: ID of the user who will have this appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.CreateAppointmentDto.DoctorName
member.summary: Name of the doctor

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.CreateAppointmentDto.Location
member.summary: Location of the appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.CreateAppointmentDto.AppointmentDate
member.summary: Date and time of the appointment

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.CreateAppointmentDto.Notes
member.summary: Optional notes for the appointment

member.name: T:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.UpdateAppointmentDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing appointment. All fields are optional to support partial updates.

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.UpdateAppointmentDto.DoctorName
member.summary: Updated doctor name

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.UpdateAppointmentDto.Location
member.summary: Updated location

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.UpdateAppointmentDto.AppointmentDate
member.summary: Updated appointment date and time

member.name: P:AppointmentService.Models.DTOs.UpdateAppointmentDto.Notes
member.summary: Updated notes
